channel.title: [508] Need a bit of help, im confused
channel.description:
I am trying to add custom items to my server. I know there are tutorials for this, but they just confused me.
(Im using davidscapes source)
I have downloaded the new corrupted pvp armors from tatemo...... but i dont know where to place the 12999 - 13046.gz files. and then after i have done that, is that all i have to do? do i need to add code somewhere else, and if so, where?
(i know this is a big request, but if you can find the time to help me, it would be much appreciated.)

item.title: [508] Need a bit of help, im confused
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

this goes in client or model help i can’t remember which, but you have to add the models to your “models” folder and then add the ints to your applet_sub1.java

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Need a bit of help, im confused
